column6: officials of the Ratanakkiri Provincial Department of Environment received an endangered pangolin found  near the town of Banlung
column7: Ratanakiri province.------On the night of May 23
column9: a provincial police team spotted the animal near Banlung city circle as the team drove past (*how/why it got there not mentioned). The team was also taken back to the Department of Environment for rehabilitation and reintegration into the wild.------At the reception
column10: Bou Ratanak and Im Phany thanked the Ministry of Interior’s National Police Department’s Central Command team for their rescue and conservation of the rare species. ------NKD
